title: A Short Hike dev halts work on unfinished RPG, saying, "I might never finish this, so I'm releasing the demo!"

title: Sailor Moon Naoko Takeuchi Collection Manga Box Set Gets Massive Discount
description: Sailor Moon: Naoko Takeuchi Collection - Manga Box Set 1 (6 Volumes) $49 (was $78) See at Amazon Sailor Moon: Naoko Takeuchi Collection - Manga Box Set 2 (6 Volumes) $72.48 (was $78) | Releases November 11 Preorder at Amazon Sailor Moon's gorgeous Naoko Takeuchi Collection Manga Box Set is discounted to its lowest price yet. Released last November with a $78 cover price, this huge six-volume collection is up for grabs for only $49 at Amazon. The collectible edition of the beloved manga was produced by Kodansha Comics and is bundled with a bunch of exclusive art cards and a premium display box.While picking up this deal, you'll also want to consider preordering the second set that completes the Naoko Takeuchi Collection ahead of its November 11 release. On the anime side, fans can save on all three Sailor Moon Crystal Set Limited Edition releases.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Berserk Complete Original Series Drops To Best Price This Year At Amazon
description: Berserk: The Complete 1997 TV Series on Blu-ray $39 (was $60) See at Amazon Berserk: The Complete 1997 TV Series is on sale for only $39 (was $60) at Amazon. This is the lowest price of the year for the Blu-ray edition of one of the greatest anime shows of its era. Widely regarded as the best anime adapted from Kentaro Miura's legendary manga, the 1997 series released on Blu-ray last spring and has remained a popular pick ever since.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: F1 The Movie Speeds to Box Office Victory, but M3GAN 2.0 Struggles Out the Gate
description: F1 The Movie got off to a fast start at the box office, racing to a $55.6 million domestic debut and $88.4 million internationally for a global launch weekend of $144 million. However, fellow new release M3GAN 2.0 struggled with a global debut of $17.158 million, down significantly on its predecessor.

title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 865
description: This time of year, Tabs was always pretty stoked about showing off his summer bod, which as you know, was curvy, Rubenesque and voluptuous. With this being the official weekend of the summer solstice, this morning I asked Rosie if she had any big plans for summer, and she just stared at me blankly and meowed something under her breath that sounded like ‚Äúscience waits for no one.‚Äù I took that as a ‚Äúno.‚Äù üòÇ Marnie‚Äôs sure been enjoying these longer summer days. In fact, she insists on waking me up at the crack of dawn so that she can go running with me, and by running I mean sprinting circles around me as I shuffle along‚Ä¶ I believe she thinks that I am her sheep. üêë Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen The post Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 865 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 883
description: So‚Ä¶what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn‚Äôt, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It‚Äôs just a list of more or less random questions I‚Äôve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Do you care about Labubus? Nah, I just don‚Äôt get the hype. 2. What‚Äôs your favorite summer dessert? Hmm, all of them? If pressed to pick one, then ice cream. 3. Do you have plans for the Fourth of July yet? Connor will be dancing with her dance team in the town parade, so that‚Äôs our main event during the day. We‚Äôll probably do a barbeque at home after the parade. Where we live doesn‚Äôt allow fireworks, so we may or may not go looking for a fireworks display. We‚Äôll see how ambitious we‚Äôre feeling! 4. How do you feel about maxi dresses? If it‚Äôs in a petite size and the print isn‚Äôt too overwhelming, then I‚Äôll rock a maxi dress, for sure. 5.
